description: Leadership encompasses the ability to inspire, guide, and influence others towards common goals and objectives. Effective leadership within organizations is essential for creating an environment where diversity, equity, and inclusion (DEI) initiatives can thrive. Leaders play a critical role in setting the tone for organizational culture, policies, and practices.

subcategories.name: Caselet 2 | A Determined Saleswoman in Peshawar | 25 Min
Article 1 | Management Women and the New Facts of Life | 20-25 Min
Article 2 | Leaders Aren't Taking Ownership of Diversity Initiatives, DEI Pros Say | 10 Min
